sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When e-mail arraive to the system the incident is updated and state is moved to 'in-progress'</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:20:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Inbound action">5ba54b474f6ce3007e72aa95d310c7a1</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When an e-mail comes to the system as a reply on open incident & incident state = On-Hold > Awaiting Caller The e-mail will update the record & move the incident back to 'In-Progress'</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 00:40:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp/> <notes/> <number>TAS0001121</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Inbound action - reply on incident</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-21 11:23:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>364f3cfb4fac23007e72aa95d310c725</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-26 09:50:37</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
